hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Baddah bin ‘Asim, from his father, that the Prophet (ﷺ) granted permission for some shepherds to stone one day and to not stone (the next) day

chapter.ara-name: باب تَأْخِيرِ رَمْىِ الْجِمَارِ مِنْ عُذْرٍ
chapter.eng-name: To delay stoning the pillars due to an excuse
